x x x x x x x x x x+x x x x x x x x x x ana šarri bēlīya x x x x x x x x u x x x x x x x x x x x-kil ebūru x+x x x x x x x x x x ṭāba Hau x x x x x x x x ebūrīšunu ma x x x x x x x annītu udēša x x x x x x x x x+x-tu₂ šiddi šadû x x x x x x innepiš pūtu ina muhhi x x x x x x x mā yāmuttu ina libbi x x x x x Hau gabbu na-mar-x x x libbu ša šarri bēlīya lū ṭāb x x x x x x-AŠ uktanniš x x x x x x x-ri-bu tuhnu kudimmu x x x x-ka innemedu x+x x x x x x x x+x mā uharri x x x x x x x x-ik u ana x x x x x x x x x ina muhhi x+x x x x x x x x x aš₂ ālu x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x ka ki mal x x x x ina qātē mār šiprēya ana muhhi šarri bēlīya assabaraššunu u x x x x x x x ša Ituʾaya x+x x x x x x x x arhiš lunammišūni x x x x x ana Nergal-eṭir {LU₂}x x x x x x muk šumma ebūru x x x x x x x šû ša e-li-x x x x x x x+x ra lu nam na me x x x x x-ka
